software.name: wagn
software.description:
Wagn combines the editing and linking capabilities of a wiki with the ability to create more complex relationships, like a database
Wagneering is the process of creating, configuring, structuring, and evolving Wagn websites.
software.custom_start_script:
#!/bin/bash
unset DATABASE_URL
export DATABASE_URL

if test -f /run/apache2/apache2.pid 
        then
                rm -f /run/apache2/apache2.pid
                echo "Warning stale Apache pid file removed"
    fi 

trap "{kill -TERM `cat   /run/apache2/apache2.pid `}"  15



touch /engines/var/run/startup_complete
mkdir -p /var/log/apache2/

/usr/sbin/apache2ctl -D FOREGROUND
software.custom_install_script:
cd /home/app 
rm  /usr/local/rbenv/versions/2.1.3/bin/rdoc
rm  /usr/local/rbenv/versions/2.1.3/bin/ri

 /usr/local/rbenv/shims/gem  install wagn
 
 /usr/local/rbenv/versions/2.1.3/bin/wagn new .
#cp app/config/install_database.yaml app/config/database.yaml  
echo "
production: 
  adapter: mysql2
  encoding: utf8
  reconnect: false
  database: _Engines_Environment(dbname)
  pool: 5
  username: _Engines_Environment(dbuser)
  password: _Engines_Environment(dbpasswd)
  host:  _Engines_Environment(dbhost)
" > config/database.yml
ls config
cat config/database.yml
export  PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/rbenv/shims/
 /usr/local/rbenv/versions/2.1.3/bin/wagn seed
#mkdb
# mv /home/app/app/* /home/app/
#link persistance

template_files.title: database.yml
template_files.content:
production:
  adapter: mysql2
  encoding: utf8
  reconnect: false
  database: _Engines_Environment(dname)
  pool: 5
  username: _Engines_Environment(dbuser)
  password: _Engines_Environment(dbpasswd)
  host:  _Engines_Environment(dbhost)
